description: This introduction to experiential anatomy uses movement and embodied awareness to explore structural and functional relationships and expressive and creative potential within the body. Emphasis is placed on "living the bodywhole" (bodymindmotionspirit) in building a value system for daily operation and for specialized performance activities. Valuable for anyone interested in living with ease, energy, and efficiency in life.
name: Body Moveable
title: The Body Movable
